original_title: 我想结婚的时候你在哪
overview: Gao Yi'an and his first fiancé broke up due to huge financial pressure during the preparation of the wedding, resulting in Gao Yi'an no longer trusting in love and marriage. He began to fear marriage, but he also yearned for marriage, which caused him to suffer from the "fear of marriage" mentality.
title: Are You Ready to Marry Me?
